p.e:
This is a gate crystal,

If you make a copy of this and place it next to the
gate(must be near or it may teleport the wrong person)
then edit the crystal.

You will see a red box show up, edit that and replace
the 11111 in instruction 1 with an 8 digit code, all 
numbers must be unique, for example.

12345678 = good
11234556 = BAD!

Next you change the ????? in instruction 2 to tell it
where you want to be sent.

Thats it! it should now respond when the gate is dialed.

I hope you appreciate the time and effort I had put into
making it work and trying to make it easy for outsiders
to customize. If you see me in world dont be shy!
Say hello!

Purple is the default crystal, use red for a wormhole
transition but I warn you it isnt for the weak of stomach
